senses.definition: 1. The form of government people select. 2. The personal beliefs and opinions an individual holds as the basis of their lifestyle. 3. The art of diplomacy.
examples: The American people share a system of politics called democracy defined by capitalism
My politics as a civil rights leader is best defined by a set of essays labeled Malone Doctrine.
The politics of war are striaghtforward and violence based while the politics of diplomacy are more nuanced and based on language.
